Xporter.name: MIQA
Xporter.SQLstring: SELECT UID=TreatmentRecord.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, MAXDate=CONVERT(DATE, MAX(TreatmentRecordDateTime)) FROM TreatmentRecord INNER JOIN Patient ON Patient.PatientSer = TreatmentRecord.PatientSer INNER JOIN RTPlan ON RTPlan.RTPlanSer = TreatmentRecord.RTPlanSer INNER JOIN PlanSetup ON PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer = RTPlan.PlanSetupSer WHERE PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer IS NOT NULL AND CAST(TreatmentRecordDateTime AS DATE) > 'this.lastActive' GROUP BY TreatmentRecord.PlanUID, Patient.PatientId, RTPlan.PlanSetupSer HAVING MAX(CAST(TreatmentRecordDateTime AS DATE)) less 'todayLag' ORDER BY CONVERT(DATE, MAX(TreatmentRecordDateTime))
